article_title: The drastic shift to voluntary coverage
article_text:
Photo: AP

Part of the new normal of insurance is a drastic shift to voluntary coverage. The Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, and all the changes surrounding it, is one big reason we’re seeing the boom in voluntary insurance coverage.

A second reason is the growth of employee wellness programs. More and more businesses are using them as a means to offset health care costs.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jeff Kolesar
article_metadata.description: Insurance is going through a drastic shift to voluntary coverage--thanks in part to PPACA and these industry changes.
